entry.content:

This is a gorgeous spacious renovated 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom apartment located in Astoria/ Long Island City. Spacious living room with open granite island counter kitchen, featuring white appliances including dishwasher and microwave. Hardwood floors throughout apartment. Lots of closet space. Apartment also features a huge terrace overlooking Manhattan Skyline.

*Live in Super *Pets okay case by case *Heat, Hot Water and Cooking Gas included *Laundry in Building *Common Outdoor area w/ BBQ Grills *Elevator BuildingContact Information- David Kusayev Licensed Real Estate Agent Cell: 718-864-4543 Email: DKusayev@hillelrealtygroup.com [email protected]
